author: hsiaowei
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.5.0-alpha.4` -- Tynamo -- released! 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.4

Test vectors: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.4

This release includes an Electra bugfix (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3868).
